description.p: MyNote is a free and open-source Minimalist's Markdown Notes App. With an embeded Markdown Editor for user convenience which includes support for Mathematical Notations in (Ka)Tex, markdown preview, and an Aggressive Emoji Parser (AutoMoji). The Markdown Spec is compliant with both the CommonMark Spec and GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) Spec.
description.ul:
Supports Markdown; GFM spec (including like task-lists, tables, links) & CoomonMark Spec
Supports Tex (using KaTex)
Includes Markdown Preview
Emoji Support (including custom emojis; the GitHub Mark, Octocat, (popular) programming language icons)
Notes Categorizer (Favourites & all Notes)
Auto-Hot Save notes (Saves as you type)
Fuzzy Notes Search bar
Notes export to HTML, PDF and MD (Markdown)
Light/Night Mode
Status info Footer
